titles.title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 46 East Ohio Street in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the "Holder-Noland Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 5/26/1994--Introduced. Designates the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 46 East Ohio Street in Indianapolis, Indiana, as the Holder-Noland Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
